name: Remote Torrent Downloader
short_description: Media streaming and sharing platform with Telegram integration.
description: Media streaming and sharing platform with Telegram integration. Remote Torrent Downloader is a self-hosted application focused on media, download, utility, streaming. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Remote Torrent Downloader on your home server to media streaming and sharing platform with telegram integration without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Remote Torrent Downloader to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
